text: János Juszkó (9 June 1939 – 2 May 2018) was a Hungarian cyclist. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in the individual road race and the 100 km team time trial. He finished in 24th and 12th place.János Juszkó . sports- reference.com He was born in Szeged, Hungary. Juszkó died on 2 May 2018 in Budapest at the age of 78.Juszkó János: aki legyőzte Felice Gimondit az olimpián… bikemag.hu ==References== ==Other websites== * Janos Juszko . cyclingarchives.com Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Hungarian cyclists Category:Olympians for Hungary
title: János Juszkó
